item.description:
Come to a FUNdraising event for the Bicycle Coalition of Maine at Flatbread Pizza Co. in Portland, 72 Commercial St. on May 23, 5-9pm.

* $3.50/pizza will be given to the BCM, takeout orders included.

* Silent Auction of cool gear, art, gift certificates, etc.
(for early bidding or list of items, visit http://www.bikemaine....)

* Raffles and Bike Rides to the event

This will also be a going away party for one of our members, Trina Chiasson, who is leaving for her cross-country bike trip the following day. More details on that may be found at http://www.bikemaine.....

Asking for RSVP's just so we know to look for each other.
item.name: Bicycle Coalition FUNdraiser
